ApproxsimClient.map.adapter
Class MapShapeAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapDrawableAdapter
      ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapShapeAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
public class MapShapeAdapter
extends MapDrawableAdapter

This adapter adapts Shape for use on the map.

fillPolygonIntersections

protected void fillPolygonIntersections(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable gld,
                                        Projection proj,
                                        Polygon polygon)
Finds intersections between the shape this adapter adapts and the given shapes. These intersection areas are then colored with the given colors.

Parameters:
gld - interface to the OpenGL routines.
proj - the actual projection.
polygon - the polygon to draw.

getWinding

public static boolean getWinding(Vector polyPoints,
                                 Projection proj)
This method determines the winding of the polygon.

Parameters:
polyPoints - the list of points in the polygon.
Returns:
true if the windind is counter clockwise (CCW) false otherwise (CW).
